metadata.name: Supreme Court Bail Application
metadata.description: Bail application template for filing before the Supreme Court of India under Article 136 or Section 439 CrPC/BNSS. Follows Supreme Court Rules 2013 formatting standards.

required_fields.label: Applicant Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the accused/applicant seeking bail

required_fields.label: Applicant Address
required_fields.description: Complete residential address of the applicant

required_fields.label: FIR Number
required_fields.description: First Information Report number with year

required_fields.label: Police Station
required_fields.description: Name and district of the police station where FIR is registered

required_fields.label: Sections Charged
required_fields.description: Penal sections under which the accused is charged

required_fields.label: Date of Arrest
required_fields.description: Date when the applicant was taken into custody

required_fields.label: Grounds for Bail
required_fields.description: Legal grounds and circumstances justifying the grant of bail
required_fields.example: The applicant has deep roots in society, is not a flight risk, and investigation is complete.

required_fields.label: Relief Sought
required_fields.description: Specific bail relief being requested from the Court
required_fields.example: Regular bail pending trial with conditions as deemed fit by this Hon'ble Court

optional_fields.label: Surety Details
optional_fields.description: Details of proposed surety including name, address, and occupation
optional_fields.example: Shri Anil Kumar, S/o Late Ram Kumar, residing at 45 Nehru Place, Delhi

optional_fields.label: Previous Bail Applications
optional_fields.description: Details of any prior bail applications filed and their outcomes
optional_fields.example: Bail application rejected by Sessions Court on 01.02.2024

template_content:
IN THE SUPREME COURT OF INDIA
CRIMINAL APPELLATE JURISDICTION

SPECIAL LEAVE PETITION (CRIMINAL) NO. _____ OF _____

IN THE MATTER OF:

{applicant_name}
... Petitioner/Applicant

VERSUS

State of _______________
... Respondent

APPLICATION FOR BAIL

Most Respectfully Showeth:

1. That the above-named petitioner is in custody since {date_of_arrest} in connection with {fir_number} registered at {police_station}.

2. That the petitioner has been charged under {sections_charged}.

3. GROUNDS FOR BAIL:
{grounds_for_bail}

PRAYER:
In view of the facts and circumstances stated above, it is most respectfully prayed that this Hon'ble Court may be pleased to:

{relief_sought}

And for this act of kindness, the petitioner shall forever pray.
